GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object matching the review_id

review.title: Jenga
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments corresponding to a review matching the review id

comments.body: Now this is a story all about how, board games turned my life upside down
comments.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: accepts a comment object and adds the comment to a review matching review id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: accepts an object containing a number to increment/decerement votes and updates the review matching review id
